title: Must Watch: Sam Hill & The Giga, need we say more?
content:
Dare I say it? Things are looking a little more positive for a season of EWS racing in 2021, and with it, Sam Hill’s return to racing his bike. The only question remains is this… Given that Nukeproof stable now houses two world class enduro race bikes, the Mega and the newly added Giga, which […]

The post Must Watch: Sam Hill & The Giga, need we say more? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
